11#ifndef MODULES_VIDEO_CODING_UTILITY_FRAMERATE_CONTROLLER_H_
12#define MODULES_VIDEO_CODING_UTILITY_FRAMERATE_CONTROLLER_H_
13
14#include <stdint.h>
15
16#include "absl/types/optional.h"
17#include "rtc_base/rate_statistics.h"
18
19namespace webrtc {
20
21class FramerateController {
22 public:
23 explicit FramerateController(float target_framerate_fps);
24
25 void SetTargetRate(float target_framerate_fps);
26 float GetTargetRate();
27
28 // Advices user to drop next frame in order to reach target framerate.
29 bool DropFrame(uint32_t timestamp_ms) const;
30
31 void AddFrame(uint32_t timestamp_ms);
32
33 void Reset();
34
35 private:
36 absl::optional<float> Rate(uint32_t timestamp_ms) const;
37
38 absl::optional<float> target_framerate_fps_;
39 absl::optional<uint32_t> last_timestamp_ms_;
40 uint32_t min_frame_interval_ms_;
41 RateStatistics framerate_estimator_;
42};
43
44} // namespace webrtc
45
46#endif // MODULES_VIDEO_CODING_UTILITY_FRAMERATE_CONTROLLER_H_
47
